name: 2136: Eden Fall 2017
description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

You and your two online teammates play as members of an elite intervention force during an alien invasion. To destroy their teleporter and stop the invasion, you will have to use alien technology against them, even if it means sacrificing parts of your body.

Plateform : PC / Engine : Unreal engine 4
Number of players : 3

Producer : Baptiste DERSOIR
Game Design : Guillaume BOISSON
Game Art : Lucas LEGER, Nicolas RAJOHNSON, Clément LEBRUN, Nicolas RUFFIN, Quentin FOURCADE
Game Programming : Etienne CHAMPAGNE, Jérémie de BARRY, Vincent YVERT
Music & Sound Design : Lou CORROYER, Alvynn DIAGNE, Gaëtan MARCHAND, Alexandre de FRAMOND, Aristide HERSANT PREVERT, Emmanuel PICCO
